name: 2DPlatformer (PennNick)
description:
This is the tutorial version of the 2D Platformer project. 

In the final version, I plan to add

  1.  Several new levels
  2. A few new power-ups
    1. Some options are a shield, a power-up that freezes enemies, or gravity flip
  3.  A new type of enemy (not sure exactly what yet)

Credits
Created By Nick Pennell
